Hello Developers, Welcome.

Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right.
If everything did, you’d be out of a job.

Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

In theory, theory and practice are the same.
In practice, they’re not.

Beware of bugs in the above code; I have only proved it correct, not tried it

To iterate is human, to recurse divine

  • Brant를 만나다.

    AXISJ를 접하게된 Brant는 주저없이 지갑을 열어 후원금을 보냈고, 그것을 인연으로 약간은 쌀쌀해진 어느 늦가을, 운명적 만남을 가졌다.
    그 후로 Tom과 Brant는 지속적으로 만나고 훗날 회사를 함께 세우게 될 줄은 서로 몰랐을 것이다.

AXISJ Open Source

AXISJ

AXISJ(from below 'We') is a group and online community developing open-source projects based on Javascript UI framework AXISJ(axis of javascript)

AXBoot

asy to build web applications with Java & HTML5. Repeatable and noise development process are resolved by AXBoot.

AX5

AX5 is an HTML5 web standard Javascript UI plugin for use with jQuery / Bootstrap.

99Nerds

Opensoure Sticker Shoppingmall

AXICon

Web application can be built more easily and quickly with more than 900 vector icons.

JSONGum

It can be useful when you want to analyze JSON data structure and find the data you want.
